title: Universo Vegano - Solferino
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Italian, Fast food, Take-out
description: Franchise vegan fast food with locations in Italy; this one opened Nov 2014. Offers burgers, sandwiches, piadina, salads, desserts and other vegan food. Has also a bar service offering breakfast, centrifuged fruit juices, smoothies, cocktails.
